about_the_game:
The priest has resurrected 10 warriors, and you need to choose 3 teammates to save this dark world together.

Rapid monster hunting, happy upgrade:

Each character has unique skills that resonate with their attributes, causing damage to explode:

3D interface, breathtaking:

Hundreds of pieces of equipment, carefully matched to be invincible:

Transfer system, making tactics more diversified:

Solving puzzles is the main means to reach the next level:


Endless monsters, endless bosses, high equipment drops without waiting;
15+hours of game duration, no fixed professions, only the strongest equipment.

Description of combat attributes:
Attack power: Only affects normal attacks and physical skill damage.
Magic: Affects magic skill damage, restores skill values, and magic defense.
Critical Strike: 1.5 times damage from regular attacks and 2 times damage from skill attacks. Restoration skills can also be critical hit.
Dodge: Only affects the chance of enemies hitting you with normal attacks.
Physical Block: Can block regular attacks and physical skills, reducing damage by 70%. Shield exclusive attributes.
Agility: increases your chances of taking action before enemies.
Resistance: Reduce the damage of this magic skill by a percentage.
Poisoned: reduces current health by 10% per turn.
Attribute Resonance: Increase the percentage damage of this type of skill, including physical and magical skills. Each piece of equipment with the same attributes increases by 20%.
Properties: There are six systems in total: fire, ice, wind, electricity, light, and darkness.
Fire attribute equipment adds extra attack, ice attribute adds extra defense, wind attribute adds extra agility, electrical attribute adds extra critical hit, light attribute adds extra dodge, and dark attribute adds extra magic. And resonate with the attributes of the department.

Job Transfer Introduction
Kingdom Swordsmen: High HP and Defense
Sage: Restoration Magic, Resurrection Magic, Light Attribute
Great Mage: Proficient in various attribute magic
Monster Hunter: Physical damage is the main focus
Magic Warrior: High magic resistance, can enjoy physical and magical attack bonuses

short_description: A turn based strategy game. Rapid level upgrade, high equipment drop, happy combination. There are a total of 11 characters, each with unique skills, and they will learn new additional skills after transfer. The combat section has sufficient content and diverse gameplay.
